price: আৰু কয়, ‘এইটো দেখোন সুস্পষ্ট যাদুৰ বাহিৰে আন একো নহয়।
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū in hādhā illā siḥ'run mubīnun
